description.p: This class provides the main functionalities of a heap, keeping the minimum on the top. The underlying implementation is a binary heap.
It provides the same interface as SplMinHeap with the extra methods, Heap::extractInsert and Heap::update which allows one to update a node in the heap.

method.name: compare
method.title: Compare elements in order to place them correctly in the heap

description.note: Having multiple elements with the same value in a Heap is not recommended. They will end up in an arbitrary relative position.

method.parameter: The value of the first node being compared.
The value of the second node being compared.
method.return: Result of the comparison, positive integer if value1 is less than value2, 0 if they are equal, negative integer otherwise.
